title: Cannot build
body: I get an error when I try to build as described, like no Cleaner class, etc. If you don't do #7 in the instructions, you can build, but you will get an error at runtime. downloaded from release will start.
author: ekusos22

comments.body: Switch the Java version in project structure to "Java 8" that should fix it :)

title: Sigma Client Cyrptominer
body: Soooo Sigma didn't have a cryptominer..?
author: luhgarlicbread

comments.body:
> Soooo Sigma didn't have a cryptominer..?

No, that was made up by Nefarious @ intent because he was jealous that Sigma bypassed better on Hypixel than his clients. That made the Sigma devs quit as they lost most of their user base because of these accusations.

> > Soooo Sigma didn't have a cryptominer..?
> 
> No, that was made up by Nefarious @ intent because he was jealous that Sigma bypassed better on Hypixel than his clients. That made the Sigma devs quit as they lost most of their user base because of these accusations.

This is the perfect response. Good to know! Yea I didn’t really believe that Sigma did have a miner but I wanted to be sure. Thanks!
